articles.title: Hi, I'm Zac!
articles.description: I like to cook, code, hike, listen to music, woodwork, and my dog winston is a spitting image.
articles.contents:
Professionally, I'm a data scientist @ Mastercard. i'm part of their economics institute & mainly focus on data science & web development. previously, I was a consultant at FactSet where I worked with investment managers on their quant workflows.
  Outside of work, I'm a mountain man. I live in Evergreen, Colorado & can usually be found with my pup (winston) up a mountain, woodworking, or coding.

articles.title: The Mountain Man Code Blog
articles.description: a few thoughts, a few lines of code
